articles.title: American Airlines stock tanks following 'surprising' guidance cut - Yahoo Finance

articles.content: American Airlines (AAL) stock is getting hit in midday trade after the company announced the departure of Vasu Raja, its chief commercial officer, and issued revised guidance that was a huge letdown … [+4346 chars]

articles.title: BHP pulls out of £39bn mega-merger with rival Anglo American - BBC.com
articles.description: The £39bn mega-merger between the two international mining giants collapses after a frantic back and forth.
articles.content:
Sean Farrington,Mitchell Labiak & Jonathan Josephs
Mining giant BHP has pulled out of its planned takeover of rival Anglo-American in a deal that would have been valued at £38.6bn.
BHP had been… [+3301 chars]
